Transform an ordinary mob into its royal variant using the Spiritual Crown
advancements.royalvariations.legacy_of_k: Obtain the Royal Staff, Royal Bow, Royal Bomb, Royal Telelocator, and Spectral Gauntlet
advancements.royalvariations.royal_knigh: Collect a full set of Royal Knight Armor
effect.royalvariations.chosen_victim.des: Gives nearby non-allied undead mobs Undead Rush effect and have them target the affected every 2 seconds.
effect.royalvariations.dazed.description: Reduces affected's movement and attack speed by 60%%.
effect.royalvariations.heaviness_of_the_: Reduces affected's movement and swimming speed by 40%% and jumping strength by 25%%; higher levels decreases movement and swimming speed.
effect.royalvariations.knightly_fortitud: Grants knockback resistance and increases armor and armor toughness
effect.royalvariations.marked.descriptio: Reduces affected's attack damage, attack speed, movement speed by 10%%, armor by 25%%, makes them glow, and causes monsters nearby to target them upon applying; higher levels increases debuffs.
effect.royalvariations.pressing_gaze.des: Causes nearby Enderman to automatically be hostile to the affected.
effect.royalvariations.royal_blessing.de: Buffs attack damage, attack speed, movement speed and armor.
effect.royalvariations.time_bomb.descrip: The target affected by the effect will detonate with a stunning explosion after a short period of time (approximately 4.2 seconds)
effect.royalvariations.undead_rush.descr: Increases movement and attack speed; only effects Undead.
info.royalvariations.royal_arrow.1: §8Applies a Mark to the target when shot with the §7Royal Bow
info.royalvariations.royal_bomb: §8Throwing bomb. Upon landing, creates a powerful overwhelming explosion with a slight delay
info.royalvariations.royal_bow: §8If you use the §7Royal Arrow §8as a projectile, hitting a target will apply a Mark to it
info.royalvariations.royal_ender_pearl: §8Causes a magical surge at the teleportation point
§8-When your health drops below 40%, you and your nearby pets gain a temporary defense bonus
info.royalvariations.royal_staff: §8Right-click to grant a buff to yourself and all your controlled creatures
info.royalvariations.spectral_gauntlet.1: §7Attacks have a 15§7% chance to bring down a §5Spectral Anvil §7on the enemy
info.royalvariations.spiritual_crown: §8Right-clicking on a mob will transform it into its royal variation
info.royalvariations.telelocator: §8Right-click on a block to link a telelocation point
info.royalvariations.telelocator.0: §8Holding the right mouse button for 4 seconds will teleport you to the linked telelocation point
info.royalvariations.telelocator.1: §8After teleportation, the telelocator will break and must be repaired using the Royal Ender Pearl
info.royalvariations.telelocator.active: §8Hold the right mouse button for 4 seconds to teleport to the linked telelocation point
info.royalvariations.telelocator.outDim: Your telelocation point is in another dimension
